sourcesContent:
{{ employeeSkill.Skill?.name || 'Compétence inconnue' }}

{{ employeeSkill.Skill?.description || 'Aucune description' }}

{{ employeeSkill.SkillLevel?.level_name || 'Niveau inconnu' }}
Date d'acquisition:

{{ employeeSkill.acquired_date ? (employeeSkill.acquired_date | date:'dd/MM/yyyy') : 'Non spécifiée' }}

Dernière évaluation:

{{ employeeSkill.last_evaluated_date ? (employeeSkill.last_evaluated_date | date:'dd/MM/yyyy') : 'Non évaluée' }}

Certifié: {{ employeeSkill.certification }}
